full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/17/2023 RECOMMENDED SCHEDULE FOR INITIAL IMMUNIZATION PROGRAMA RECOMENDADO PARA LA VACUNACION BEATRIZ GARCIA, M.D. CIVIL SURGEON & GENERAL PRACTICE AGE RECOMMENDED TYPE OF IMMUNIZATIONS RECOMMENDED 867 S.W. 1ST STREET EDAD RECOMENDADA TIPO DE VACUNAS RECOMENDADAS MIAMI, FL 33130 U.S.A. 2 MONTHS MESES DTP TOPV (305) 324-7665 & MONTHS / 4 MESES DTP TOPV 6 MONTHS / 6 MESES DTP 15 MONTHS / 15 MESES MMR 18 MONTHS / 18 MESES DTP. NOTICE TO PARENTS PLEASE TAKE THIS RECORD CARD WITH YOU EACH TIME YOU VISIT YOUR DOCTOR OR HEAL TH CLINIC BE SURE THEY ENTER THE REQUIRED INFORMATION IN THIS RECORD CONCERNING EACH IMMUNIZATION YOUR CHILD RECEIVES FLORIDA LAW FS 232.032 REQUIRES YOUR CHILD TO BE ADEQUATELY IMMUNIZED PRIOR TO ENTRANCE INTO ANY SCHOOL IN FLORIDA AVISO A LOS PADRES POR FAVOR LLEVE ESTA TARJETA CADA VEZ QUE VISITE A SU MEDICO 0 LA CLINICA ASEGURESE QUE ANOTEN EN ESTA TARJETA CADA VACUNA QUE SU HIJO RECIBA LA LEY DE LA FLORIDA FS 232.032 REQUIERE QUE SU HUO ESTE DEBIDAMENTE VACUNADO ANTES DE PODER MATRICULARSE EN LAS ESCUELAS DEL ESTADO.
